terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.inputs
Interface InputButtonTarget

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionTrigger, InputButtonSplitter, InputButtonTrigger, SelectTrigger
public interface InputButtonTarget

This interface serves as a target for user interface input button events.

Method Summary
 void setInputButton(int button)
          Called when the button state changes.
 void setInputClick(int click)
          Called when a button click occurs.
 

Method Detail

setInputButton

public void setInputButton(int button)
Called when the button state changes. This event occurs in conjunction with click events.

Parameters:
button - New button selection (InputSensor.BUTTON_???).

setInputClick

public void setInputClick(int click)
Called when a button click occurs. All clicks in a series (single, double, etc.) will be reported, not just the final click and its count. This event occurs in conjunction with button events.

Parameters:
click - New click selection (InputSensor.CLICK_???).
